author: csteele
releaseNotes:
v1.3.26  Updated minimum cookie count to be a variable: minCookieCount.
   v1.3.25  Updated supportedThermostatModes and supportedThermostatFanModes to add double quotes to support HE platform version 2.3.3.x
v1.3.24  removed number typing on setCoolingSetpoint and setHeatingSetpoint used by Thermostat Controller app

drivers.name: Total Comfort API C
drivers.description: Integrate Honeywell's Total Comfort Control for your WiFi Thermostat.
